title: War Table Banner
info: The War Table Banner is a decorative banner obtained by defeating the Dark Mage in the Old One's Army event. During the last Tier 1 wave, it has a 10% chance to drop; during the fourth and sixth Tier 3 waves, it has a 5% chance to drop. The Dark Mage drops 4 banners at a time.
stat:

Furniture

Use time15 (Very fast)
